title: 49ers-Packers, Aaron Rodgers, NBA, & the Herd Hierarchy
itunes:title: 49ers-Packers, Aaron Rodgers, NBA, & the Herd Hierarchy
description:
Colin discusses the MNF 49ers-Packers, how Green Bay Packers QB Aaron Rodgers is keeping his team alive, the start of the NBA season, and the Herd Hierarchy. Guests include Marcellus Wiley, Peter King, Cliff Avril, and Lane Johnson.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
